document_data.name: Holger
document_data.mainbody: '''Holger''' was a member of the [[Cult of the Crushing Wave]] during the [[Elemental Evil]] crisis.
document_data.Personality: Holger commanded the gatehouse of [[Rivergard Keep]].
document_data.History: In [[1491 DR]], Holger was in charge of the gatehouse of Rivergard Keep, disguised as a sellsword under [[Jolliver Grimjaw]]. However, he was confronted and defeated by some adventurers.
